name: The Zombie Apocalypse Game
description:
Welcome to the page of my Zombie Apocalypse game.

Right now the game is in development, but if you buy it now, you will get all the coming updates free. The price will be changed after the release!

This game is planned to be a fantasy RPG game with zombies being the most common enemies. 

If you have any ideas or suggestions for the game feel free to contact me. Right now I'm working on the engine and an editor for the game, so any ideas are welcome.

To get weekly info about the development of the game follow me on Instagram or for more detailed info about the features check out my Patreon page.

Also join our community on Discord.
